Wisdom: الْإِيمَانُ شَجَرَةٌ أَصْلُهَا الْيَقِينُ وَفَرْعُهَا التُّقَى وَنُورُهَا الْحَيَاءُ وَثَمَرُهَا السَّخَاءُ
enWisdom: Faith is a tree, its root is certitude, its branch is piety, its sunlight is modesty and its fruit is generosity
Faith is acknowledging with the tongue and acting with the limbs

Wisdom: الْإِيمَانُ وَالْإِخْلَاصُ وَالْيَقِينُ وَالْوَرَعُ الصَّبْرُ وَالرِّضَا بِمَا يَأْتِي بِهِ الْقَدَرُ
enWisdom: Faith, sincerity, certitude and piety are [encapsulated in] patience and acceptance of what has been decreed [by Allah]

Wisdom: أَصْلُ الْإِيمَانِ حُسْنُ التَّسْلِيمِ لِأَمْرِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The foundation of faith is total submission to the will of Allah

Wisdom: الْإِيمَانُ صَبْرٌ فِي الْبَلَاءِ وَشُكْرٌ فِي الرَّخَاءِ
enWisdom: Faith is patience in tribulation and gratitude in ease

Wisdom: فَمِنَ الْإِيمَانِ مَا يَكُونُ ثَابِتاً [تَائِباً] مُسْتَقِرّاً فِي الْقُلُوبِ وَمِنْهُ مَا يَكُونُ عَوَارِيَ بَيْنَ الْقُلُوبِ وَالصُّدُورِ
enWisdom: One type of faith is that which is firmly fixed in the hearts and another is that which shifts between the hearts and breasts [without being firmly fixed in the hearts]

Wisdom: كَسْبُ الْإِيمَانِ لُزُومُ الْحَقِّ وَنُصْحُ الْخَلْقِ
enWisdom: Acquiring faith is [through] adhering to the truth and being sincere with the creatures
The basis of faith is unwavering certitude
